description: Silk Road Sounds is Hong Kong-via-London based record label founded by creative collective Yeti Out. SRS bridges the sonic gap between the East and West, which follows the same trade route the project is named after. Across 60 minutes, the monthly showcase features pioneers of new scenes, and localises the otherwise varied club sounds of Eurasia.
